statements: SELECT * FROM soil_health_data
SELECT id, sensor_id, temperature FROM soil_health_data
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT sensor_id, soil_moisture FROM soil_health_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT humidity FROM soil_health_data
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data WHERE soil_moisture > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, humidity FROM soil_health_data WHERE temperature < 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, temperature FROM soil_health_data WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data WHERE humidity < 50 AND temperature > 30 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, sensor_id, soil_moisture FROM soil_health_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM SoilData;
SELECT soil_id, soil_moisture, timestamp FROM SoilData WHERE soil_moisture > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorInfo ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, installation_date FROM SensorInfo WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM SoilData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilData WHERE soil_moisture > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(soil_moisture) AS avg_moisture FROM SoilData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.location, AVG(sd.soil_temperature) AS avg_temp FROM SensorInfo s JOIN SoilData sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id GROUP BY s.sensor_id, s.location
SELECT * FROM SoilData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' AND soil_temperature < 25
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(soil_moisture) AS max_moisture FROM SoilData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_moisture > 70
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data;
SELECT location, temperature, moisture FROM soil_health_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM weather_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trend_id, trend_type FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type='Prediction';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, moisture FROM soil_health_data WHERE location='Field A';
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT trend_type, trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT location, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed < 10
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data WHERE moisture BETWEEN 20 AND 50
SELECT * FROM SoilData;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM SoilData WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM SoilData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location_id, latitude, longitude, elevation FROM SensorLocation WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT analysis_id, sensor_id, timestamp, nutrient_levels FROM SoilAnalysis WHERE nutrient_levels->>'nitrogen' > '50';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM SoilData;
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, nutrient_levels FROM SoilAnalysis WHERE water_content > 0.5;
SELECT trend_id, sensor_id, trend_type FROM SoilTrends WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SoilData JOIN SensorLocation ON SoilData.sensor_id = SensorLocation.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM soil_health_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT field_name, crop_type, area FROM field_info WHERE area > 50 ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, manufacturer FROM sensor_info WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT analysis_id, ph_level, nutrient_levels FROM soil_analysis WHERE ph_level < 6 AND nutrient_levels->>'N' > 20;
SELECT * FROM sensor_info WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Sensors';
SELECT field_name, crop_type, area FROM field_info ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM soil_health_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT analysis_id, ph_level, nutrient_levels FROM soil_analysis WHERE ph_level BETWEEN 6.5 AND 7.5;
SELECT trend_date, trend_description FROM trends_data WHERE trend_value > 0 ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
